summary: All four requirements appear to be implemented in the diff. REQ-2 is addressed by updating AddSpotlightDialog.tsx with a required photo upload at the top, validation error, and upload progress. REQ-3 is addressed by updating EditSpotlightDialog.tsx with current photo preview, replacement upload with progress, and fallback to existing image.
